title: Vodafone Idea Q2 Preview: Losses to narrow on better ARPU and cost control
rationale: Score 4/7: Positive intraday momentum above VWAP (+0.94%) with strong RS (+3.67%). Q2 earnings preview suggests narrowing losses, but watch for ARPU trends and execution on cost control.

title: Lenskart GMP crashes to zero, wiping out all pre-listing buzz ahead of Monday debut
rationale: IPO debut watch: Grey market premium collapse suggests weak listing demand. Consumer discretionary sector may see sentiment impact on peers.
